name: White Feathers Fly, A Sky of Stars Vanish
desc: While an ally target has "Critical Boost," their CRIT Rate increases by 10%. For every 1% of excess CRIT Rate, increases CRIT DMG by 2%, up to a max increase of 180%.
enhanced_desc: While an ally target has "Critical Boost," their CRIT Rate increases by 15%. For every 1% of excess CRIT Rate, increases CRIT DMG by 2%, up to a max increase of 270%.
